com.marklogic.hub.scaffold

Interface Scaffolding

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScaffoldingImpl

    public interface Scaffolding
    Interface that handles the management of DHF projects on disk Includes creating entities, flows, rest extensions, and transforms for an already initialized project
    See Also:
    for the initialization of the project itself to disk

      • getFlowDir

        java.nio.file.Path getFlowDir(java.lang.String entityName,
                              java.lang.String flowName,
                              FlowType flowType)
        Returns the directory of the flow
        Parameters:
        entityName - - the entity name
        flowName - - the name of the flow
        flowType - - FlowType (sjs or xqy)
        Returns:
        the directory path as a Path type

        void createEntity(java.lang.String entityName)
        Creates an entity given a string name
        Parameters:
        entityName - - the name of the entity as string

      • createMappingDir

        void createMappingDir(java.lang.String mappingName)
        Creates a mapping given a string name
        Parameters:

      • createFlow

        void createFlow(java.lang.String entityName,
                java.lang.String flowName,
                FlowType flowType,
                CodeFormat codeFormat,
                DataFormat dataFormat)
        Creates a flow for an entity with Entity Services model as default
        Parameters:
        entityName - - name of the entity to associate the flow with
        flowName - - the name of the flow as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        codeFormat - - the format of the code as CodeFormat enum
        dataFormat - - the format of the data (json or xml)

      • createFlow

        void createFlow(java.lang.String entityName,
                java.lang.String flowName,
                FlowType flowType,
                CodeFormat codeFormat,
                DataFormat dataFormat,
                boolean useEsModel)
        Creates a flow for an entity with an additional option for using Entity Services
        Parameters:
        entityName - - name of the entity to associate the flow with
        flowName - - the name of the flow as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        codeFormat - - the format of the code as CodeFormat enum
        dataFormat - - the format of the data (json or xml)
        useEsModel - - true to use Entity Services, false not to

      • createFlow

        void createFlow(java.lang.String entityName,
                java.lang.String flowName,
                FlowType flowType,
                CodeFormat codeFormat,
                DataFormat dataFormat,
                boolean useEsModel,
                java.lang.String mappingNameWithVersion)
        Creates a flow for an entity with an additional option for using Entity Services
        Parameters:
        entityName - - name of the entity to associate the flow with
        flowName - - the name of the flow as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        codeFormat - - the format of the code as CodeFormat enum
        dataFormat - - the format of the data (json or xml)
        useEsModel - - true to use Entity Services, false not to
        mappingNameWithVersion - - the name of the mapping name and version together (name-version) you wish to use to generate the content plugin

      • updateLegacyFlows

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> updateLegacyFlows(java.lang.String fromVersion,
                                                   java.lang.String entityName)
        Updates a legacy flow on disk
        Parameters:
        fromVersion - - string version number of DHF
        entityName - - the entity which the flow is attached
        Returns:
        a list of updated flows by name

      • updateLegacyEntity

        void updateLegacyEntity(java.lang.String entityName)
        Update a specific entity that's legacy
        Parameters:
        entityName - - name of the entity

      • updateLegacyFlow

        boolean updateLegacyFlow(java.lang.String fromVersion,
                         java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.String flowName,
                         FlowType flowType)
        Update a legacy flow
        Parameters:
        fromVersion - - string version number of DHF
        entityName - - the entity which the flow is attached
        flowName - - the name of the flow as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if it failed to update the flow

      • createRestExtension

        void createRestExtension(java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.String extensionName,
                         FlowType flowType,
                         CodeFormat codeFormat)
                  throws ScaffoldingValidationException
        Creates a rest extension on disk to be deployed to server
        Parameters:
        entityName - - the entity which the flow is attached
        extensionName - - the name of the extension as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        codeFormat - - the format of the code as CodeFormat enum
        Throws:
        ScaffoldingValidationException - - thrown if the extension fails to pass validation

      • createRestTransform

        void createRestTransform(java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.String transformName,
                         FlowType flowType,
                         CodeFormat codeFormat)
                  throws ScaffoldingValidationException
        Creates a rest transform on disk to be deployed to server
        Parameters:
        entityName - - the entity which the flow is attached
        transformName - - the name of the transform as a string
        flowType - - the type of flow as TypeFlow, eg: harmonize or ingest
        codeFormat - - the format of the code as CodeFormat enum
        Throws:
        ScaffoldingValidationException - - thrown if the extension fails to pass validation
